CustomField.description: Captures the cost of the reimbursement item (excluding mileage).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the amount for this line item. If you're submitting a flat rate reimbursement, the following rules apply: $15, $25, or $35 for a Driver Safety Course, $35 (or less) for a Tax-Aide Assignment, or $50 (or less) for a Tax-Aide Supervisory Assignment.
CustomField.label: Amount
